availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Augustus Muhlenberg Van Bokkelen (Storey County, Nevada Territory, miner & commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Storey County, Nevada Territory, miner and commissioner of deeds. North Carolina native. Miner in California in 1859. Miner in Storey County, Nevada Territory, in 1860. Commissioner of deeds for the State of Kentucky in the Nevada Territory in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Nevada, Storey County, Virginia City, p. 375A.
Great Registers, 1866-1898, Alameda County, California State Library, Sacramento, Ca., p.147.
"Van Bokkelen Rites Slated for Tomorrow," Oakland Tribune (Oakland, CA), Mar. 4, 1929, p. 35.
KYR-0001-031-0258.
